messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Library Lounge.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo cargo boys can we get some more money for a evac ship worthy of nut

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near NUT, please stand-by.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Why do i have to manually wire the wires to t-comms fuck you central command.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: T-Comms aren't down because of power i don't know why it's down
